鼲鼲鼲

鼲字的基本解释

鼲
hún
鼠的一种，体小，背部灰色，腹部白色，尾毛蓬松。毛皮柔软如绒，可作衣物。俗称“灰鼠”。

鼲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hún］
［《廣韻》户昆切，平魂，匣。］
灰鼠。亦指其毛皮。

鼲字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼲； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1529第05
【唐韻】乎昆切【集韻】胡昆切，?音魂。【說文】鼠出丁零胡，皮可爲裘。【本草】鼲鼠，卽黃鼠，時煖則出坐穴口，見人則交前兩足於頸，拱立如揖，乃竄入穴。淮南子謂聖人師拱鼠制禮，是也。一名禮鼠。一名拱鼠。一名?狸。【魏志·陳思王傳】鼲鼬讙譁於林木。　又【集韻】公渾切，音昆。【廣雅】鼠屬。

鼲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鼲字的起名意思

暂无。

鼲
Basic explanation of words
鼲
hún
A small rat with a gray back, white abdomen, and fluffy tail hair. The fur is soft as velvet and can be used as clothing. Commonly known as "squirrel".
鼲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hún］
["Guangyun" Hu Kunqie, Ping Hun, Xia. ]
Squirrel. Also refers to its fur.
鼲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼲; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1529 05
【Tang Yun】Hu Kunqie 【Ji Yun】Hu Kunqie, the soul of sound. [Said the text] The mouse comes out of Dinglinghu, and the skin can be fur. [Materia Medica] Mole rat, yellow squirrel, when it is warm, go out to sit at the acupuncture point, and when you see a person, hand the front two feet to the neck, arching and standing like a bow, but rushing into the acupuncture point. Huainanzi said that the saint's teacher made a rat ritual, yes. A ritual rat. An arch rat. A raccoon dog. [Wei Zhi·Chen Si Wang Biography] The weasel slammed in the woods.　[Jiyun] Gong Hun cut, Yin Kun. [Guangya] Rat is the genus.
鼲
